## BotBuilderCloudAdapter.NotificationTargetStorage interface

Interface for a storage provider that stores and retrieves notification target references.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NotificationTargetStorage 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [delete(key)](./teamsfx.botbuildercloudadapter.notificationtargetstorage.delete.md) | Delete one notification target by its key. |
|  [list()](./teamsfx.botbuildercloudadapter.notificationtargetstorage.list.md) | List all stored notification targets. |
|  [read(key)](./teamsfx.botbuildercloudadapter.notificationtargetstorage.read.md) | Read one notification target by its key. |
|  [write(key, object)](./teamsfx.botbuildercloudadapter.notificationtargetstorage.write.md) | Write one notification target by its key. |
